translation.ko: 운전 좀 해본 솜씨던데 직업이 타이어 쪽이냐? - 아니 - 자동차 튜닝하나?

translation.en: YOU BOOST CARS?
- NO. NEVER. - EVER DONE TIME?
COUPLE OF OVERNIGHTERS. NO BIG DEAL.

translation.en: HAH. TUCSON, RIGHT?
YEAH, I HAD JESSE RUN A PROFILE ON YOU, BRIAN EARL SPILNER.

translation.en: HE'LL FIND ANYTHING ON THE WEB, ANYTHING ABOUT ANYBODY.

translation.en: SO WHY BULLSHIT?
SO WHAT ABOUT YOU?
TWO YEARS IN LOMPOC.
I'LL DIE BEFORE I GO BACK.
- OH, GREAT. - WHAT?
IT'S GONNA BE A LONG-ASS NIGHT, THAT'S WHAT.
FOLLOW US.
I THOUGHT WE HAD AN AGREEMENT. YOU STAY AWAY, I STAY AWAY.

WE GOT LOST, JOHNNY. WHAT DO YOU WANT ME TO TELL YOU?

translation.en: - WHO'S "WE"? - UH, MY NEW MECHANIC.
BRIAN, MEET JOHNNY TRAN.
THE GUY IN THE SNAKESKIN PANTS, THAT'S HIS COUSIN, LANCE.

translation.en: - THIS YOUR RIDE? - IT WAS. IT'S HIS NOW.
translation.ko: - 네 거야? - 그랬지만 지금은 도미닉 거야

translation.en: NO, IT'S NOT. I HAVEN'T TAKEN DELIVERY.
translation.ko: 그렇지 않아 아직 명의 이전도 안 했어

translation.en: THEN IT'S NOBODY'S CAR. SOMEBODY PUT IN THE WRENCH TIME.

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK, LANCE? IT'S AN AMAZING MACHINE.
[ Johnny ] YES, INDEED.
LET'S GO.
I'LL SEE YOU IN THE DESERT NEXT MONTH. BE READY TO HAVE YOUR ASS HANDED TO YOU.
translation.ko: 다음 달에 사막에서 만나자 네 엉덩이를 납작하게 해주마

translation.en: - YOU'RE GONNA NEED MORE THAN THAT CROTCH ROCKET. - I GOT SOMETHIN' FOR YOU.
translation.ko: - 네 가운데 로켓만으론 힘들걸 - 널 위해 특별히 준비한 게 있지

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT ALL ABOUT?
translation.ko: - 도대체 무슨 말이야? - 사연이 길어, 나중에 얘기할게

translation.en: LONG STORY. I'LL TELL YOU LATER. LET'S GET OUTTA HERE.
translation.ko: - 도대체 무슨 말이야? - 사연이 길어, 나중에 얘기할게 빨리 여길 뜨자

translation.en: NOS!
SO, WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT ALL ABOUT?
translation.ko: "T&K 푸드" - 무슨 일이기에 그 난리였어? - 얘기가 길어

translation.en: IT'S A LONG STORY.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이기에 그 난리였어? - 얘기가 길어

translation.en: WELL, WE GOT A 20-MILE HIKE. HUMOR ME.
A BUSINESS DEAL THAT WENT SOUR.
PLUS, I MADE THE MISTAKE OF SLEEPIN' WITH HIS SISTER.

translation.en: YO, SPILNER.
- YOU WANT A BEER? - YEAH, SURE.
OH, SHIT.
YO, DOM. HEY, MAN. WE WERE JUST ABOUT TO GO LOOKIN' FOR YOU, BROTHER.

translation.en: WHERE WERE YOU?
THERE WERE MASS COPS THERE. THEY CAME IN FROM EVERY DIRECTION.
translation.ko: 경찰이 깔렸었어 사방에서 치고 들어오는 게

translation.en: THEIR SHIT WAS ORCHESTRATED. THIS YOUR BEER?
translation.ko: 작전하에 움직이는 것 같았어 - 이 맥주 네 거야? - 그래

translation.en: YEAH, THAT'S MY BEER.
YO, EINSTEIN. TAKE IT UPSTAIRS.
YOU CAN'T DETAIL A CAR WITH THE COVER ON.
translation.ko: 이봐, 아인슈타인, 올라가서 해 커버 씌우고 자동차를 손질할 순 없잖아

translation.en: CAN'T EVEN GET THAT RIGHT. YOU ALL RIGHT?
AM I ALL RIGHT? [ Letty ] IT WAS JUST A QUESTION.
YO, DOM! WHY'D YOU BRING THE BUSTER HERE?

translation.en: 'CAUSE THE BUSTER KEPT ME OUT OF HANDCUFFS!

translation.en: HE DIDN'T JUST RUN BACK TO THE FORT!
translation.ko: 왜냐면 쟤 때문에 수갑을 안 찼으니까! 너희들처럼 도망가지 않고 날 데리러 돌아왔어

translation.en: THE BUSTER BROUGHT ME BACK.
translation.ko: 너희들처럼 도망가지 않고 날 데리러 돌아왔어

translation.en: YOU CAN HAVE ANY BREW YOU WANT-- AS LONG AS IT'S A CORONA.
translation.ko: 마시고 싶은 대로 마셔 코로나 맥주라면 말이야

translation.en: THANKS, MAN. THAT'S VINCE'S, SO ENJOY IT.
YOU--
HEY, BRO, YOU GOT A BATHROOM?
YEAH, UPSTAIRS. FIRST DOOR ON THE RIGHT.

translation.en: HE'S GOT NO CALL BEIN' UP IN HERE.
translation.ko: 녀석은 여기 올 일이 없어 저 녀석에 대해서 전혀 모르잖아

translation.en: - YOU DON'T KNOW THAT FOOL FOR SHIT! - HE'S RIGHT, DOM.
translation.ko: 녀석은 여기 올 일이 없어 저 녀석에 대해서 전혀 모르잖아 - 얘 말이 맞아 - 빈스, 내가 널 모를 때도 있었어

translation.en: VINCE, THERE WAS A TIME WHEN I DIDN'T KNOW YOU.

translation.en: THAT WAS IN THE THIRD GRADE!
[ Dominic ] YEAH, SO, WHAT GIRLS ARE HERE? HO! YOU JUST NAME IT. YOU WANT MINE?
translation.ko: - 물오른 계집애들 좀 왔냐? - 골고루 있지, 내 걸 줄까?

translation.en: YOU NEED TO SHUT THE F-- YOU WANT TWO?
YOU DON'T HAVE ANYTHING? YOU LOOK A BIT TIRED.

translation.en: [ Letty ] YOU SHOULD GO UPSTAIRS AND GIVE ME A MASSAGE.
LOOK AT ALL OUR GUESTS.

translation.en: HOW ABOUT WE GO UPSTAIRS AND YOU GIVE ME A MASSAGE?

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] CRAZY LADY.
YOU KNOW YOU OWE ME A TEN-SECOND CAR, RIGHT?

translation.en: OUCH.
OH, SHIT.
DID YOU WIPE THE SEAT?
OH, JESUS CHRIST! WOULD YOU CUT THIS SHIT ALREADY? COME ON!

AW, COME ON, MAN. WE WERE JUST ABOUT TO GET ALONG.

translation.en: SO, WHAT DO YOU WANT? UH, ANYTHING, LONG AS IT'S COLD.
YOU KNOW, MY BROTHER LIKES YOU. HE USUALLY DOESN'T LIKE ANYBODY.
translation.ko: 우리 오빠가 널 좋아해 딴 사람들은 별로 안 좋아하지

translation.en: YEAH, HE'S A COMPLICATED GUY.
translation.ko: 우리 오빠가 널 좋아해 딴 사람들은 별로 안 좋아하지 - 그래, 생각이 복잡한 친구지 - 그럼 넌 어떤데?

translation.en: YEAH? WHAT ABOUT YOU?
translation.ko: - 그래, 생각이 복잡한 친구지 - 그럼 넌 어떤데?

translation.en: I'M SIMPLER. YOU'RE A SHITTY LIAR.

YOU NEED TO GET SOME SLEEP.
AND YOU DEFINITELY, DEFINITELY NEED A SHOWER.

SHOW ME YOUR HANDS. VERY GOOD. NOW OPEN THE DOOR.
PUT YOUR HANDS ON YOUR HEAD. BEHIND YOUR HEAD.
FACE THE FRONT OF THE VEHICLE, WALK BACKWARDS TOWARDS THE REAR.

WHAT'D I DO?
SHUT UP. HE'S CLEAN, SARGE.

WOW. NICE CRIB, SERGEANT.

translation.en: IT'S A LOT NICER THAN THAT LAST PLACE YOU CONFISCATED. AIN'T IT?
translation.ko: 임시 본부치곤 근사하네요 지난번 몰수했던 곳보다 나아요 그렇지? 엘리자베스 테일러를 위해

OKAY, HERE HE IS, FRESH FROM TORETTO'S HOT ROD HEAVEN.
THAT WAS AN $80,000 VEHICLE, OFFICER.

translation.en: - WAIT A MINUTE. YOU TELL HIM WHAT HAPPENED? - HE KNOWS WHAT HAPPENED.

translation.en: SEND THE BILL TO JOHNNY TRAN. BRIAN. THE KID'S GIVIN' ME ATTITUDE?

translation.en: THAT DOESN'T SPEAK VERY WELL FOR POLICE-F.B.I. RELATIONS, TANNER.

translation.en: I WALK IN THE DOOR, AND THE GUY'S ALREADY GIVIN' ME-- ALL RIGHT, ALL RIGHT.
WE'LL TALK, OKAY? LET'S TALK ABOUT IT.

UH, DECAF, I THINK.
FOUR HIJACKINGS IN TWO MONTHS, AND WE DON'T HAVE ANYTHING.
DVD PLAYERS AND DIGITAL CAMERAS ALONE ARE WORTH A MILLION-TWO,

WE'RE IN THE POLITICAL CROSSHAIRS NOW, BRIAN.

YOU WANT THAT DETECTIVE BADGE FAST, KID. AND YOU WANNA KNOW SOMETHING?

translation.en: THE F.B.I. CAN HELP, IF YOU COME THROUGH FOR US.
translation.ko: 이번 일만 제대로 처리하면 FBI에서 도와줄 수 있어

translation.en: WHAT DOES THE TRUCK DRIVER SAY?

translation.en: LAB SAYS THE SKID MARKS CAME BACK THE SAME:

translation.en: MASHAMOTO Z.X. TIRES.
SO WE KNOW THAT IT'S SOMEBODY IN THE STREET RACING WORLD.
WE DON'T MAKE THIS CASE SOON, THE TRUCKERS WILL TAKE MATTERS INTO THEIR OWN HANDS.

translation.en: I TELL 'EM WE'RE CLOSE.
YOU GONNA MAKE ME A LIAR?
LOOK, WHAT DO WE KNOW?
WE ALL KNOW THIS WORLD REVOLVES AROUND TORETTO, RIGHT?

translation.en: NOW, I'M NOT SAYIN' THAT HE'S NECESSARILY THE ONE THAT'S POPPIN' THESE TRUCKS,

translation.en: BUT I CAN GUARANTEE THE BOTH OF YOU THAT HE KNOWS WHO IS.

translation.en: IT'S JUST A MATTER OF TIME UNTIL I WIN--

translation.en: YOU WANT TIME, BUY THE MAGAZINE. WE DON'T HAVE TIME.
translation.ko: 시간이 필요해? 잡지나 보고 있을 시간은 우리에게 없어

translation.en: JUST GET ME SOMETHING I CAN USE.
IS HARRY COOPERATING?
YEAH, LIKE A GUY THAT'S GONNA DO THREE TO FIVE FOR RECEIVING STOLEN PROPERTY IF HE DOESN'T.
translation.ko: 안 그랬다간 장물 거래 혐의로 빵에 가야 하잖아요

translation.en: WHAT KIND OF VIBE IS HE GETTING FROM TORETTO?
translation.ko: 안 그랬다간 장물 거래 혐의로 빵에 가야 하잖아요 토레토를 어떻게 생각하고 있지?

translation.en: HE'S SCARED TO DEATH OF HIM, BUT HE DOESN'T THINK HE'S JACKIN' TRUCKS IN HIS SPARE TIME.
translation.ko: 그를 두려워하지만 트럭 강탈은 안 한다고요

translation.en: - HE'S TOO CONTROLLED FOR THAT. - WAIT.
NOT THAT I WANT TO CONTRADICT HARRY'S FINE JUDGE OF CHARACTER,
translation.ko: 해리가 사람 볼 줄 안다는 건 반박을 안 하겠네만

translation.en: BUT, UH, TORETTO DID HARD TIME FOR NEARLY BEATING A GUY TO DEATH.
translation.ko: 토레토는 사람을 초주검 만들고 빵에서 몇 년 살다 왔지

translation.en: HE'S GOT NITROUS OXIDE IN HIS BLOOD AND A GAS TANK FOR A BRAIN.
translation.ko: 놈의 피에는 니트로가 흐르고 머릿속은 휘발유로 꽉 찼어

translation.en: DO NOT TURN YOUR BACK ON HIM.
HEY, TANNER. I'M GONNA NEED ANOTHER CAR.
WHAT ABOUT PARTS AND SERVICE? HOLD OFF ON THAT.
DOM, I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO WITH THIS.
ALL RIGHT, WHAT THE HELL IS THIS? WHAT DO YOU GOT THERE?
translation.ko: 희한하네, 저건 또 뭐야? 뭘 끌고 왔지?

translation.en: - THIS IS YOUR CAR. - MY CAR?
I SAID A TEN-SECOND CAR, NOT A TEN-MINUTE CAR.
translation.ko: 10초 안에 끝내는 차 달랬지 저런 고물 달랬냐?

translation.en: YOU COULD PUSH THIS ACROSS THE FINISH LINE, OR TOW IT.
translation.ko: 결승점으로 밀고 가도 되고 견인차로 끌어도 되겠네

translation.en: COULDN'T EVEN TOW THAT ACROSS THE FINISH LINE.
[ Mia And Letty Laugh ] NO FAITH.
translation.ko: 저건 끌고 가지도 못해 믿음이 부족하군

translation.en: OH, I HAVE FAITH IN YOU, BUT THIS ISN'T A JUNKYARD.
- THIS IS A GARAGE. - HEY, POP THE HOOD.
- POP THE HOOD? - POP THE HOOD.
[ Jesse ] TWO J.Z. ENGINE. NO SHIT. AND WHAT DID I TELL YOU?
translation.ko: - JZ 엔진이 2개야, 말 되네 - 헛소리 아니지?

translation.en: I RETRACT MY PREVIOUS STATEMENT. YOU KNOW WHAT?
THIS WILL DECIMATE ALL AFTER YOU PUT ABOUT 15 GRAND IN IT.
translation.ko: 1만 5천 달러 정도만 쓰면 다 죽일 수 있겠어

translation.en: OR MORE, IF WE HAVE TO OVERNIGHT PARTS FROM JAPAN.
WE'LL PUT IT ON MY TAB AT HARRY'S. YES!
translation.ko: 일본에서 부품들을 속달로 부쳐오면 말이야 - 그건 해리가 외상으로 해줄 거야 - 좋았어!

translation.en: I GOTTA GET YOU RACING AGAIN SO I CAN MAKE SOME MONEY OFF YOUR ASS.
translation.ko: 널 다시 경주하게 해야겠어 그래야 널 이용해 돈을 벌지

translation.en: THERE'S THIS SHOW DOWN IN THE DESERT CALLED RACE WARS,
AND THAT'S WHERE YOU'LL DO IT.
I'LL TELL YOU WHAT. WHEN YOU'RE NOT WORKIN' AT HARRY'S, YOU'RE WORKIN' HERE.
translation.ko: 해리네 가게에서 일 안 할 땐 여기 와서 있어도 돼

translation.en: IF YOU CAN'T FIND THE RIGHT TOOL IN THIS GARAGE, MISTER ARIZONA,
translation.ko: 여기서 맘에 드는 연장을 못 찾는다면, 애리조나 씨

translation.en: YOU DON'T BELONG NEAR A CAR.
HE OWNS YOU NOW.
[ Jesse ] TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK ABOUT THIS. KONI ADJUSTABLES.
translation.ko: 어떻게 생각하나 말해 줘 코니 조절 장치들이야

translation.en: GONNA SAVE US ABOUT TWO POUNDS.
AND THEY'RE GONNA GIVE US BETTER TRACTION FOR THE HOLE SHOT.
ALL RIGHT?
THIS IS YOUR BASIC LAYOUT OF THE CAR,
AND THAT'S PRETTY MUCH WHAT IT COULD LOOK LIKE WHEN IT'S FINISHED.
translation.ko: 다 만들고 나면 이것과 거의 비슷할 거야

translation.en: RED, GREEN.
MAN, YOU SHOULD BE GOIN' TO M.I.T. OR SOMETHIN'. YEAH, RIGHT.
translation.ko: - 넌 MIT 공대를 가야겠어 - 말처럼 쉽지 않아

translation.en: NO, I GOT THAT-- OH, WHAT'S IT CALLED?
THAT ATTENTION DISORDER--
- OH, A.D.D.? - YES, THAT SHIT. YEAH.
YOU KNOW, I WAS GOOD IN ALGEBRA... AND LIKE MATH AND SHIT.
translation.ko: 난 함수나 수학에 관련된 건 더럽게 잘했어

translation.en: EVERYTHING ELSE I FAILED. DROPPED OUT OF SCHOOL.
